level.heading: Supersession.
level.text: This chapter supersedes the rule of the common law known as the rule against perpetuities.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-292
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-292, see notes following § 19-901.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 9 of the Uniform Statutory Rule Against Perpetuities Act.
